name: uspgrun
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0

stmt.origin: upgrun(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
stmt.pretty: upgrun(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cupgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cupgr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cupgr))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(ciedg, c1))
-| wceq(c4, cfv(ciedg, c2))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(cvtx, c1))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c2), c5))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cin(cdm(c3), cdm(c4)), emptycls))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cvtx, c0), c5))
-| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), cun(c3, c4)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ UPGraph)
⊣ c3 =(iEdg ` c1)
⊣ c4 =(iEdg ` c2)
⊣ c5 =(Vtx ` c1)
⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c2)= c5)
⊣ (w0 →(dom(c3)⋂ dom(c4))= ∅)
⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c6)
⊣ (w0 →(Vtx ` c0)= c5)
⊣ (w0 →(iEdg ` c0)=(c3 ⋃ c4))

comment: The union ` U ` of two simple pseudographs ` G ` and ` H ` with the same vertex set ` V ` is a pseudograph with the vertex ` V ` and the union ` ( E u. F ) ` of the (indexed) edges. (Contributed by AV, 16-Oct-2020.)
